Body:
with codecs.open('testdata/models/routing_pedestrian.json', mode='r',
    encoding='utf-8') as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://route.ls.hereapi.com/routing/7.2/calculateroute.json',
    expectedResponse, status=200)
response = self._api.pedastrian_route([11.0, 12.0], [22.0, 23.0], [herepy.
    RouteMode.pedestrian, herepy.RouteMode.fastest])
expected_short_route = (
    'Mannheim Rd; W Belmont Ave; Cullerton St; E Fullerton Ave; La Porte Ave; E Palmer Ave; N Railroad Ave; W North Ave; E North Ave; E Third St'
    )
self.assertEqual(response.route_short, expected_short_route)
responses.activate
